originalText.text: April in the office is extremely professional,but when you get on shift and deal with the supervisors Vanisha and Debbie brown it's another story Vanisha is extremely rude in speaking with staff and Debbie just follows everything Vanisha does. Guss won't listen to an employee he'll go with whatever supervisor Vanisha says. Was definitely a horrible work experience if you know your worth and been doing security for sometime now go where you'll be appreciated and that's far away from this place. We're all adults and need to be treated with respect.

originalText.text: My name is check Today is my first day with A&M security , they sent me in jacob javits center and it was amazing , all the supervisors "vanisha and jeff and dave " was proffessional and they show me every thing also they motivated me im so happy with this company thank you guys

originalText.text: Horrible company. They would call me to see if im gonna make my shift but dont call  me to let me know nobody is gonna be at the office to pick up my check. Google said they were open but i get there and its a peice of paper saying office is closed. smh. I have things i gotta do and me not getting paid for the work i did when im supposed to is a big issue.

originalText.text: Hello, are you guys open tomorrow? I want to come in for the 8 hour annual but calling the listed # since last week. No answer. Message left w/ my # but no reply. I'll be going elsewhere by Thursday. Thanks in advance.
